section.name: EOF
section.code:
*<<<< EOF CLR-FRM-DSF SECTION. INI-CLR-FRM-DSF. *JPA ini 23-MAR-1995 14:06:38 * MOVE ZEROES TO FRM-VAL-DTOT IN DSF-FLD. **DAD ini 25-OCT-1993 * MOVE ZEROES TO FRM-VAL-TCAS IN DSF-FLD. **DAD fin 25-OCT-1993 * MOVE ZEROES TO FRM-VAL-TIND IN DSF-FLD. *JPA fin 23-MAR-1995 14:06:38 FIN-CLR-FRM-DSF. EXIT.
*JPA ini 23-MAR-1995 14:06:38 * CLR-FRM-CYR SECTION. * INI-CLR-FRM-CYR. * MOVE ZEROES TO FRM-VAL-TCAS IN DSF-FLD. * FIN-CLR-FRM-CYR. * EXIT. *JPA fin 23-MAR-1995 14:06:38 *>>>>

section.name: FIN_FST_KEY_DSF
section.code: *<<<< FIN_FST_KEY_DSF MOVE -1 TO RBS-GLS-NCLS-LEN IN DSF-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: FIN_PUT_ALL_DSF
section.code:
*<<<< FIN_PUT_ALL_DSF MOVE 'SGC' TO MSC-COD-SIST. MOVE 'FISF' TO MSC-COD-TMSC IN MSC. MOVE 'FDSF' TO MSC-COD-CMSC IN MSC. PERFORM BUS-MSC. MOVE MSC-GLS-DATA IN MSC TO FRM-FEC-FDSF IN DSF-FLD.
*DAD ini 16-JUN-1992 * ADD FRM-VAL-TCAS IN DSF-FLD * FRM-VAL-DTOT IN DSF-FLD * GIVING FRM-VAL-DSUP IN DSF-FLD. *DAD fin 16-JUN-1992 *JPA ini 23-MAR-1995 * NGA-INI/CAMBIO ARCHIVO DEUDA BANCARIA/OCT 2013 * ADD FRM-VAL-TIND IN DSF-FLD * FRM-VAL-TDIR IN DSF-FLD * GIVING FRM-VAL-DSUP IN DSF-FLD * ADD * DSF-VAL-CDIR IN DSF-FLD TO * FRM-VAL-DSUP IN DSF-FLD. * NGA-FIN/CAMBIO ARCHIVO DEUDA BANCARIA/OCT 2013 *JPA fin 23-MAR-1995 *>>>>

section.name: FIN_PUT_CYR_DSF
section.code: *<<<< FIN_PUT_CYR_DSF *DAD ini 16-JUN-1992 ADD CYR-VAL-DDIR IN DSF-FLD CYR-VAL-DIND IN DSF-FLD GIVING FRM-VAL-TCAS IN DSF-FLD. *DAD fin 16-JUN-1992 *>>>>

section.name: FIN_PUT_DSF_DSF
section.code: *<<<< FIN_PUT_DSF_DSF *JPA ini 23-MAR-1995 12:21:15 * ADD DSF-VAL-DVGN IN DSF-FLD * DSF-VAL-IVGT IN DSF-FLD * DSF-VAL-DVCN IN DSF-FLD * DSF-VAL-IVCT IN DSF-FLD * DSF-VAL-DVGX IN DSF-FLD * DSF-VAL-DVCX IN DSF-FLD * GIVING FRM-VAL-DTOT IN DSF-FLD. *DAD ini 25-OCT-1993 * ADD DSF-VAL-CDIR IN DSF-FLD * DSF-VAL-CIND IN DSF-FLD * GIVING FRM-VAL-TCAS IN DSF-FLD. *DAD fin 25-OCT-1993 * NGA-INI/CAMBIO ARCHIVO DEUDA BANCARIA/OCT 2013 * ADD DSF-VAL-DVGN IN DSF-FLD * DSF-VAL-DVCN IN DSF-FLD * NGA-FIN/CAMBIO ARCHIVO DEUDA BANCARIA/OCT 2013 * DPM INI 09.05.2003 * DSF-VAL-DDIF IN DSF-FLD * DSF-VAL-DDOP IN DSF-FLD * DPM FIN 09.05.2003 * NGA-INI/CAMBIO ARCHIVO DEUDA BANCARIA/OCT 2013 * DSF-VAL-CDIR IN DSF-FLD * DSF-VAL-DMOR IN DSF-FLD * GIVING FRM-VAL-TDIR IN DSF-FLD. * ADD DSF-VAL-IVGT IN DSF-FLD * DSF-VAL-IVCT IN DSF-FLD * DSF-VAL-CIND IN DSF-FLD * GIVING FRM-VAL-TIND IN DSF-FLD. * NGA-FIN/CAMBIO ARCHIVO DEUDA BANCARIA/OCT 2013 *NGA INI/CAMBIO ARCHIVO DEUDA BANCARIA/OCT 2013 ADD DSF-VAL-DVGN IN DSF-FLD DSF-VAL-DMOR IN DSF-FLD *NGA INI/CAMBIO ARCHIVO DEUDA BANCARIA/AGO 2014 * DSF-VAL-DDOP IN DSF-FLD *NGA FIN/CAMBIO ARCHIVO DEUDA BANCARIA/AGO 2014 DSF-VAL-CDIR IN DSF-FLD DSF-VAL-DVCN IN DSF-FLD DSF-VAL-IVGT IN DSF-FLD DSF-VAL-CRII IN DSF-FLD DSF-VAL-NIPA IN DSF-FLD GIVING FRM-VAL-DSUP IN DSF-FLD. *NGA FIN/CAMBIO ARCHIVO DEUDA BANCARIA/OCT 2013 *JPA fin 23-MAR-1995 12:21:15 *>>>>

section.name: FIN_VAL_CON_KEY_DSF
section.code: *<<<< FIN_VAL_CON_KEY_DSF IF DBC-CAI-ICLI IN DSF-FLD > SPACES AND DBC-IIC-ICLI IN DSF-FLD NOT > ZEROES *GET-MSG Busca mensaje en tabla MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'CICICLINOCON' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-KEY-DSF. IF DSF-CAI-IDEU IN DSF-FLD > SPACES AND DSF-IIC-IDEU IN DSF-FLD NOT > ZEROES *GET-MSG Busca mensaje en tabla MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'CICIDEUNOCON' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-KEY-DSF. *>>>>

section.name: FRM_VAL_DSUP
section.code: *<<<< FRM_VAL_DSUP *DAD ini 16-JUN-1992 ADD DSF-VAL-DVGN IN DSF-FLD DSF-VAL-IVGT IN DSF-FLD DSF-VAL-DVCN IN DSF-FLD DSF-VAL-IVCT IN DSF-FLD DSF-VAL-DVGX IN DSF-FLD DSF-VAL-DVCX IN DSF-FLD *DAD ini 25-OCT-1993 * CYR-VAL-DDIR IN DSF-FLD * CYR-VAL-DIND IN DSF-FLD DSF-VAL-CDIR IN DSF-FLD DSF-VAL-CIND IN DSF-FLD *DAD fin 25-OCT-1993 GIVING WSS-VAL-DTOT. IF FRM-VAL-DSUP IN DSF-FLD NOT = WSS-VAL-DTOT MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'VALDTOTERR' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR. *DAD fin 16-JUN-1992 *>>>>

section.name: FRM_VAL_DTOT
section.code: *<<<< FRM_VAL_DTOT ADD DSF-VAL-DVGN IN DSF-FLD DSF-VAL-IVGT IN DSF-FLD DSF-VAL-DVCN IN DSF-FLD DSF-VAL-IVCT IN DSF-FLD DSF-VAL-DVGX IN DSF-FLD DSF-VAL-DVCX IN DSF-FLD GIVING WSS-VAL-DTOT. IF FRM-VAL-DTOT IN DSF-FLD NOT = WSS-VAL-DTOT MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'VALDTOTERR' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR. *>>>>

section.name: FRM_VAL_TCAS
section.code: *<<<< FRM_VAL_TCAS *DAD ini 16-JUN-1992 *DAD ini 25-OCT-1993 * ADD CYR-VAL-DDIR IN DSF-FLD * CYR-VAL-DIND IN DSF-FLD ADD DSF-VAL-CDIR IN DSF-FLD DSF-VAL-CIND IN DSF-FLD GIVING WSS-VAL-DTOT. *DAD fin 25-OCT-1993 IF FRM-VAL-TCAS IN DSF-FLD NOT = WSS-VAL-DTOT MOVE 'TAB' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'VALDTOTERR' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR. *DAD fin 16-JUN-1992 *>>>>

section.name: INI_VAL_CON_KEY_DSF
section.code: *<<<< INI_VAL_CON_KEY_DSF IF FRM-FFLD = FRM-FFLD-PF7 OR FRM-FFLD-PF8 GO TO FIN-VAL-CON-KEY-DSF. *>>>>

section.name: NOT PGM_PER AND INI_PUT_CYR_DSF
section.code: *<<<< INI_PUT_CYR_DSF *DAD ini 16-JUN-1992 IF PGM-STAT-CYR-NUL GO TO FIN-PUT-CYR-DSF. IF NOT PGM-STAT-CYR-OKS PERFORM CLR-CYR-DSF PERFORM CLR-FRM-CYR GO TO FIN-PUT-CYR-DSF. *DAD fin 16-JUN-1992 *>>>>

section.name: NOT PGM_PER AND INI_PUT_DSF_DSF
section.code: *<<<< INI_PUT_DSF_DSF IF PGM-STAT-DSF-NUL GO TO FIN-PUT-DSF-DSF. IF NOT PGM-STAT-DSF-OKS PERFORM CLR-DSF-DSF PERFORM CLR-FRM-DSF GO TO FIN-PUT-DSF-DSF. *>>>>
